description: meta info used by the FPLO parser, all names are expected to start with x_fplo_

metaInfos.description: FPLO sub version
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_program_version_sub

metaInfos.description: FPLO compilation options
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_program_compilation_options

metaInfos.description: Reciprocal Lattice vectors (in Cartesian coordinates). The first index runs over the $x,y,z$ Cartesian coordinates, and the second index runs over the 3 lattice vectors.
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_reciprocal_cell

metaInfos.description: FPLO-internal index for each atom
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_atom_idx

metaInfos.description: Wyckoff position index of each atom
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_atom_wyckoff_idx

metaInfos.description: CPA block of each atom
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_atom_cpa_block

metaInfos.description: FPLO structure type: Crystal/Molecule
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_structure_type

metaInfos.description: FPLO number xc functional
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_xc_functional_number

metaInfos.description: FPLO notation of xc functional
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_xc_functional

metaInfos.description: FPLO projection method for DFT+U calculation
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_projection

metaInfos.description: FPLO notation for DFT+U functional
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_functional

metaInfos.description: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U properties
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_section_dftPu_orbital

metaInfos.description: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: atom index
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_atom

metaInfos.description: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: orbital label (normally (n,l)), notation: '3d', '4f', ...
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_label

metaInfos.description: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: value U
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_U

metaInfos.description: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: value J
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_J

metaInfos.description: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: value Ueff
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_Ueff

metaInfos.description: FPLO: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: element
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_element

metaInfos.description: FPLO: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: species index
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_species

metaInfos.description: FPLO: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: value F0
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_F0

metaInfos.description: FPLO: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: value F2
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_F2

metaInfos.description: FPLO: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: value F4
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_F4

metaInfos.description: FPLO: Atom/Orbital dependent DFT+U property: value F6
metaInfos.name: x_fplo_dftPu_orbital_F6
